metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
flag_mapping.4: Missing critical information in Loyalty Points
flag_mapping.8: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations

1.description: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
1.fix_approach: Ensure only one of Window Seat or Aisle Seat is True

2.fix_approach: Correct the departure and arrival datetimes

4.description: Missing critical information in Loyalty Points
4.fix_approach: Ensure loyalty points are provided for all passengers

8.description: Mismatch between Layovers count and layover locations
8.fix_approach: Ensure the number of Layovers matches the number of layover locations
